args.goal: Grab the white bottle and place it in the blue area

tasks.check_point: Move the arm to the position above the white bottle
tasks.expected_image_description: The robotic arm is positioned above the white bottle.

tasks.check_point: Lower the arm to grab the white bottle
tasks.expected_image_description: The robotic arm is lowered to the white bottle.

tasks.check_point: Close the gripper to secure the white bottle
tasks.expected_image_description: The gripper is closed, securing the white bottle.

tasks.check_point: Lift the arm with the white bottle
tasks.expected_image_description: The robotic arm is lifted with the white bottle.

tasks.check_point: Move the arm to the position above the blue area
tasks.expected_image_description: The robotic arm is positioned above the blue area with the white bottle.

tasks.check_point: Lower the arm to place the white bottle in the blue area
tasks.expected_image_description: The robotic arm is lowered to the blue area with the white bottle.

tasks.check_point: Open the gripper to release the white bottle
tasks.expected_image_description: The gripper is open, releasing the white bottle in the blue area.

tasks.check_point: Lift the arm back to a neutral position
tasks.expected_image_description: The robotic arm is lifted back to a neutral position.
